articles.title: Matty Potts to Jadeja FOUR - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Matty Potts to Jadeja, FOUR, hundred for Jadeja. What an innings! He walked in when India were in trouble at 98/5 and now has a hundred to his name. Again the same question, is this his best ever knock? The sword celebration comes out first and then the helme…
articles.content: ✖
